image_1.description: Figure 1 in the text is an event, showing the timeline of influential developments in the research area of diachronic word embeddings.
image_1.reason: The image is a timeline chart titled 'Distributional models in the task of tracing diachronic semantic shifts: research timeline.' This directly aligns with the main topic of the paper, which is diachronic word embeddings and semantic shifts detection. The timeline spans from 2010 to 2017, highlighting key milestones and developments in this field.
